languages.text: {n}Мейв беспокойно теребит платье.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, может быть, вам будет угодно посетить пир? Или казнь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лидзи беспокойно теребит платье.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, может быть, вам будет угодно посетить пир? Или казнь?"

languages.text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

languages.text: {n}梅芙焦虑不安地摆弄着裙子。{/n}“或许大人您愿意赏光参加宴会？或是参观行刑？”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙焦虑不安地摆弄着裙子。{/n}“或许大人您愿意赏光参加宴会？或是参观行刑？”

languages.text: {n}メイヴは不安そうにドレスの裾をいじった。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}は宴にご出席なさいますか？それとも、処刑をご覧になりますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは不安そうにドレスの裾をいじった。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}は宴にご出席なさいますか？それとも、処刑をご覧になりますか？」

languages.text: {n}Maive juguetea nerviosamente con su vestido.{/n} «¿Tal vez a mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial le apetecería asistir al banquete? ¿O quizá a la ejecución?».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive juguetea nerviosamente con su vestido.{/n} «¿Tal vez a mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial le apetecería asistir al banquete? ¿O quizá a la ejecución?».

languages.text: {n}Maive, endişe içinde elbisesiyle oynuyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, ziyafete katılmak veya idamları seyretmek ister mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, endişe içinde elbisesiyle oynuyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, ziyafete katılmak veya idamları seyretmek ister mi?"

languages.text: {n}Maive tripote nerveusement sa robe.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie aimerait peut-être se rendre au festin ? Ou assister à l'exécution ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive tripote nerveusement sa robe.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie aimerait peut-être se rendre au festin ? Ou assister à l'exécution ? »

languages.text: {n}Maive nestelt nervös an ihrem Kleid herum.{/n} "Vielleicht, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}, wollt Ihr dem Festmahl beiwohnen? Oder der Exekution?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive fidgets anxiously with her dress.{/n} "Perhaps my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would like to attend the feast? Or the execution?"
